Desc.entry: Registered charity working to improve community safety and the environment of the local area and to reduce nuisance, violence and vandalism. Objectives also cover social and economic needs of the community, such as education, employment, health and recreation. Runs a variety of courses ranging from Basic Food Hygiene and Desktop Publishing. Hosts sessions run by Woodseats Advice Service and advice sessions for parents with young children. Also hosts playschemes, youth clubs and Lowedges Agewell Group.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9am-3pm (office times), there are a wide range of groups and times, please contact for details.
